contest-event.event-date:
June 11, 1887 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes - 1st £14.15s. and cornet, 2nd £10 and euphonium, 3rd £6.10s. and tenor horn. Quickstep: 1. Black Dyke, 2. Wyke Temperance Trombone Trio: 1. Black Dyke, 2. Wyke Temperance. 5 bands competed.
Jan. 21, 2013, 5:23 p.m. May 9, 2019, 6:07 p.m.
1 Black Dyke Band Alexander Owen Beethoven's Works [arr. Owen]
2 Leeds Forge Edwin Swift Leonora
3 Wyke Old John Gladney Jnr Weber Fantasia [arr. Gladney]
4 Wyke Edwin Swift Weber's Works
5 Morley Borough Unknown
